get_formatted_method_descriptor(encoded_method, class_descriptor, method_descriptor=None)¶

Replace all obfuscatable names with X

Parameters:
  • encoded_method (dvm.EncodedMethod) – The encoded method parsed by Androidguard.
  • class_descriptor (str) – The class descriptor.
  • method_descriptor (str, optional) – Defaults to None. The method descriptor.

Formatted method descriptor.

get_formatted_xref(xref)¶
get_lib_classes_signatures_json_info()¶
get_libraries(lsh, mode=<MODE.SCALABLE: 1>, repackage=False, LIB_RELATIONSHIP_GRAPHS=None, exclude_builtin=True)¶

Get all third party libraries used in this app.

Parameters:
  • lsh (MinHashLSH) – Indexed Locality Sensitive Hashing (LSH) object.
  • mode (<enum 'MODE'>, optional) – Defaults to MODE.SCALABLE. The detection mode. Either MODE.ACCURATE or MODE.SCALABLE.
  • repackage (bool, optional) – Defaults to False. Should LibID consider classes repackaging?
  • LIB_RELATIONSHIP_GRAPHS (dict, optional) – Defaults to None. A dictionary of the library relation graphs. LIB_RELATIONSHIP_GRAPHS[lib_name] = (call_graph, interface_graph, inheritance graph).
  • exclude_builtin (bool, optional) – Defaults to True. Should LibID exclude builtin Android libraries?
Returns:

Library matches.
Return type:

dict
get_matched_libs_json_info()¶
get_method_signature(encoded_method, class_descriptor, dex_idx)¶

Get signature of an encoded method

Parameters:
  • encoded_method (dvm.EncodedMethod) – The encoded method parsed by Androidguard.
  • class_descriptor (str) – The class descriptor.
  • dex_idx (int) – The index of the dex file. Some apps contain multiple dex files.
Returns:

The list of method signatures.
Return type:

list

get_relationship_graphs(repackage=False)¶
Get the call_graph, interface_graph and superclass_graph
repackage (bool, optional): Defaults to False. Should LibID consider classes repackaging?
Returns:invocation, interface, and inheritance graph
Return type:list

LibID.module.profiler¶

module.profiler.parallel_load_libs_profile(lib_profiles, mode=<MODE.SCALABLE: 1>, repackage=False, processes=1)¶

Loading library profiles as a MinHash list and relation graphs.

Parameters:
  • lib_profiles (list) – The list of library profiles.
  • mode (<enum 'MODE'>, optional) – Defaults to MODE.SCALABLE. The detection mode. Either MODE.ACCURATE or MODE.SCALABLE. See the paper for more details.
  • repackage (bool, optional) – Defaults to False. Should LibID consider classes repackaging? This should only be enabled if already know classes repackaging is applied.
  • processes (int, optional) – Defaults to 1. The number of processes to use.
Returns:

(the minhash list, the relation graph dictionary)
Return type:

tuple
module.profiler.parallel_profiling_binaries(paths, output_folder, profile_type, processes=1, overwrite=False)¶

Profiling Android app/library binaries to JSON files.

Parameters:
  • paths (list) – The list of binaries.
  • output_folder (str) – The folder to store profiles.
  • profile_type (str) – Either ‘app’ or ‘lib’.
  • processes (int, optional) – Defaults to 1. The number of processes to use.
  • overwrite (bool, optional) – Defaults to False. Should LibID overwrite the binary profile if it exists?
module.profiler.write_to_json(file_path, obj)¶
